game.name: Subway Run New 2019
game.description:
After the huge success of Subway Surfers, a brand new adventure game is ready to help gamers to entertain for hours. Subway Run New 2019 is an exclusively-designed crazy run game that is full of fun and excitement for all the Subway Surf lovers. Get ready to run on the subways, cover as much distance as you can, collect the coins you see on your way to unlock new levels during this adventurous gameplay. Challenge your friends in a competitive environment, grab coins and win cool surprises in the end!
A policeman chases you along the way. So, your objective in this free online running game is to surf away from him while avoiding all the obstacles that come on your way. Apart from this, you are also looking forward to collect as many coins as you can to secure points and win rewards later. Change the lanes of your character through the left and right arrow keys! Jump him with the up arrow key and make him slide through using the down key! Use the hoverboard with the help of spacebar key and make him fly in the air by clicking the button on-screen!
The longer distance you cover over the platform; the better points you will be able to make in this fun html5 arcade racing game. It offers authentic 3D tram surf conditions, perpetual running, and energetic hurdles. Evade obstacles and beat movement signals in a way you have not done before! Apart from coins, you also have to focus on collecting the items that will help boost your abilities during the running missions. Good luck to challenge your limits and make sure that you will not be caught by the policeman in this top mobile game! All the best to check out more popular perpetual running games online on atmegame.com, with no installation required.
